leave apply.project description: Request to take time off from work by providing necessary details for your leave request.

empid.description: Employee ID for applying new leave request Example format:'cds23','cds56'

startdate.description: Start date of leave apply YYYY-MM-DD

enddate.description: End date of leave apply YYYY-MM-DD

reason.description: Reason for applying leave request : choices sick, personal, or vacation

leave cancel.project description: Revoke a previously applied leave request, making yourself available for work on the specified dates.

leaveid.description: Leave ID for cancelling leave request Example format:'L23','L06'

reason.description: Reason for cancelling leave request : choices nowork, plancancel, or wrongdate
